text:
【圣瓦西里升天大教堂】(外观)俄罗斯最重要的文化遗产之一，被联合国教科文组织列为世界文化遗产，典型俄式东正教教堂，展现了16世纪俄罗斯民间建筑艺术风格和拜占庭风格。 童话世界里的“洋葱头”。
【古姆商场】俄罗斯国立百货商场，世界著名十大百货商场之一，与其说是商场，不如说更
像宫殿，内饰极具欧洲古典风格。
【列宁墓】瞻仰世界伟大的革命导师列宁
【克里姆林宫】(入内参观)原沙皇居所，现普京办公地，俄罗斯联邦的象征。
trans:
[The Red Cathedral (Exterior)] One of the most important cultural heritage of Russia, listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a typical Russian Orthodox cathedral, showing the 16th century Russian folk architectural art style and Byzantine style. The "Onion Dome" in the fairytale world.
[GUM] Russian National Department Store, one of the ten most famous department stores in the world, is more like a palace than a shopping mall,
with a very European classical style interior.
[Lenin's Mausoleum] The world's great revolutionary mentor Lenin.
[Moscow Kremlin] (Inside) The former residence of the Tsar, now Putin's office, the symbol of the Russian Federation.
